Identity.History: Many Germanic sagas feature warrior women. Some famous examples are Hervor, who was killed in the 4th century defending a Gothic fortress from the Huns, and Brunhild from the Nibelungenlied.
Identity.Tooltip: Many Germanic sagas feature warrior women. Some famous examples are Hervor, who was killed in the 4th century defending a Gothic fortress from the Huns, and Brunhild from the Nibelungenlied.
